item.title: Live Updates: Trump Officials Push Back Against U.S. Report on Iran’s Nuclear Program
item.description: As the cease-fire between Israel and Iran entered a second day, the Trump administration contradicted a preliminary, classified U.S. intelligence repo...

item.title: Vietnam Abolishes Death Penalty for Embezzlement and Other Crimes
item.description: The move, one official said, would help the country extradite suspects from abroad. It would also spare the life of a recently convicted tycoon.

item.title: Kennedy Withdraws Funding Pledge to International Vaccine Agency
item.description: In a video address, the health secretary said the United States would no longer donate to Gavi, the vaccine agency. The organization rejected his clai...

item.title: Rubio Fleshes Out Trump’s Case That Iran Nuclear Capacity Was Eliminated
item.description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio said U.S. strikes had destroyed a facility that is key to producing a nuclear weapon. He railed against a less optimist...

item.title: Eurostar Trains Delayed and Canceled After Cable Theft
item.description: The company running the passenger service between Britain and continental Europe advised travelers to “cancel or postpone.”
